title: End of game stats.
body: When is Riot going to fix this. Haven't been able to join a game because I'm "apparently" in a game that ended 15min ago. I've restarted my client, pc and even my router. The latter two obviously would have no effect. =.='

replies.body:
Hey Guys,
Just an update to this.
We believe we have found the root cause and will be testing a fix within the next 48 hours.

Further updates can be found here http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#oce
Thank you very much for putting effort into this, it's become pretty frustrating.
It has been getting better recently, for me anyways. Instead of every game, it's just most games now.
I've found it's mainly with the new SR. ARAM seems completely fine. Normals and Ranked are by far the worst.
